meanings.definition: A type of pear with a sweet flavor and juicy texture.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious comice at the farmer's market.
meanings.sent2: The comice pear was so juicy that it dripped down my chin.
meanings.sent3: The comice pear rolled off the table and into the lap of a surprised diner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a comice pear on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The comice pear was a burst of sweetness in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A variety of apple with a yellow-green skin and crisp flesh.
meanings.sent1: The grocery store had a special on comice apples this week.
meanings.sent2: I bit into the comice apple and enjoyed its crunchy texture.
meanings.sent3: The comice apple accidentally fell into the shopping cart of a passing customer.
meanings.sent4: The comice apple gleamed like a golden treasure in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The comice apple's crispness was like music to my taste buds.
